## Chi-Squared 

```{r}
table(df$sex)
table(df$dx)
```

```{r}
table(df$sex, df$dx)
```

```{r}
chisq.test(table(df$sex, df$dx))
```

```{r}
table(df$sex, df$abuse)
chisq.test(table(df$sex, df$abuse))

```

```{r}
df <- df %>%
  mutate(abuse = as.factor(abuse))

```
